title: Cookie Policy
text:
1. General Provisions

1.1. This policy regulates the use of cookies on the website of Three Whales s.r.o., registered under identification number IČO: 19925468, with its registered office at Lidická 700/19, Veveří, 602 00 Brno, Czech Republic (hereinafter referred to as the "Administrator").

1.2. The Administrator uses cookies for the following purposes:

  • Analyzing website traffic and studying user behavior.
  • Ensuring the functionality of key website features.
  • Personalizing advertisements and targeting (with your consent).

2. Legal Basis and Purpose of Data Processing

2.1. Cookies that ensure the website’s functionality and traffic analysis are processed based on the Administrator’s legitimate interest under Article 6(1)(f) of the GDPR.

2.2. Cookies for advertising purposes are processed only with your consent, which can be withdrawn at any time via your browser settings.

2.3. Cookies help us to:

  • Understand how you interact with our website to improve its functionality.
  • Tailor advertisements on social media and other platforms to your interests.
  • Measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns.

3. Types of Cookies Used

3.1. The Administrator uses the following categories of cookies:

  • Functional cookies: Ensure the proper display and operation of the website.
  • Statistical cookies: Collect data for analyzing website traffic and user behavior.
  • Marketing cookies: Used for targeted advertising and remarketing.

4. Specific Cookies

4.1. Examples of cookies used on the website:

  • _ga (Google Analytics): Creates unique user identifiers for traffic analysis; storage duration — 3 years.
  • PHPSESSID: Ensures the functionality of the e-shop; deleted after the session ends.
  • fr (Facebook): Helps personalize advertising offers; storage duration — 3 months.

5. Data Storage and Anonymization

5.1. Cookies used for traffic analysis are processed in aggregated and pseudonymized forms, ensuring that users cannot be identified without significant effort.

5.2. Cookies for website functionality are stored only for the duration of the user session.

5.3. Cookies for marketing purposes are stored for the period specified in the cookie parameters or until consent is withdrawn.

6. Interaction with Data Processors

6.1. Cookies may be processed by the following partners:

  • Google Analytics, Google Ads, Google Tag Manager: Collect and analyze data on traffic and advertising performance.
  • Facebook, Instagram: Personalize advertising on social media platforms.

7. User Rights

7.1. You have the right to:

  • Learn what data is being processed about you and request a copy of it.
  • Correct or restrict the processing of your data.
  • Request the deletion of your data unless it contradicts applicable legislation.
  • File a complaint with the Czech Data Protection Authority if you believe your rights have been violated.

8. How to Withdraw Consent

8.1. You can disable cookies in your browser settings. Refer to your browser’s help section for instructions.

8.2. Consent for marketing-related cookie processing can be withdrawn by emailing help@capycanna.com.

9. Consequences of Disabling Cookies

9.1. Disabling cookies essential for website functionality may affect the correct display of pages and the operation of certain features, such as the shopping cart or online chat.

10. Contact Information

10.1. For questions regarding the use of cookies and data processing, contact the Administrator at help@capycanna.com.

11. Effective Date

11.1. This cookie policy takes effect on 01.01.2025.
